item.title: Nil Literal
item.description: The nil basic type has only a single value called nil. So, both the type and the value use the syntax ().

item.title: Null Literal
item.description: For JSON compatibility you can also write () as null. This will help you to copy and paste JSON values as expressions in the code. But avoid using null in non-JSON-related places.
